confirmed_facts: Pope Leo 14 will travel from 27 November to 2 December 2025 to Turkey and Lebanon.
27 November: visit to the mausoleum of Mustafa Kemal AtatÃ¼rk in Ankara and a meeting with President Recep Tayyip ErdoÄŸan.
28 November: visit to the Holy Trinity Cathedral in Istanbul, pilgrimage to Iznik, and attendance at the 1,700th anniversary of the First Council of Nicaea.
29 November: visit to the Sultan Ahmed Mosque (Blue Mosque) in Istanbul and a large Mass held at the Volkswagen Arena.
30 November: visit to the Armenian Apostolic Church in Istanbul, concluding the Turkish leg of the trip.

1 December: memorial service for the 2020 Beirut port chemical explosion, meeting with President Joseph Aoun, visit to the tomb of Maronite saint Charbel Makhluf, and the Marian statue on Harissa Hill.

timeline.event: Arrival in Ankara; visit to AtatÃ¼rk mausoleum; meeting with President ErdoÄŸan.
Holy Trinity Cathedral in Istanbul; pilgrimage to Iznik; Nicaea Council 1700th anniversary.
Sultan Ahmed Mosque visit; Mass at Volkswagen Arena.
Armenian Apostolic Church visit; end of Turkey leg.
Memorial for Beirut blast; meeting with President Aoun; visit to Charbel Makhluf tomb and Harissa Marian statue.
